info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 3:24PM EDT until July 20 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LAPEER COUNTY... At 324 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brown City to near Imlay City to near Oxford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Imlay City, Almont and Brown City around 330 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Goodland Township, Burnside, Attica and Thornville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
